title: Complete WMS Production-Ready Implementation
problem: WMS had orphaned pages (RouteOptimization, BarcodeScanning) not accessible via routing, and module pages (Production, Maintenance, Sales) using mock data instead of real backend APIs
solution: Created comprehensive frontend API hooks for all modules (Production, Maintenance, Sales, RouteOptimization), added missing routes to App.tsx, added navigation menu items to Header.tsx, and connected all pages to real backend endpoints. All pages now fetch data from backend instead of using mock data.
